--- title: "Welcome to BMSC 620" author: "Emile Latour" date: "2026-01-05" date-format: long format: revealjs: theme: "../../assets/css/reveal-bmsc620_v4.scss" slide-number: true show-slide-number: all width: 1955 height: 1100 footer: "BMSC 620" header-includes: | execute: echo: true freeze: auto --- ## Welcome to BMSC 620

**Emile Latour, MS** Biostatistician, OHSU Knight Cancer Institute   This course builds on prior versions developed by **Meike Niederhausen** and **Nicky Wakim**, with updates and revisions for Winter 2026. ## Some important tasks
- **Bookmark the course website**   - **Complete Homework 0 by Sunday at 11:00 pm** - Get comfortable with RStudio and Quarto - Make sure you can render a document successfully - This assignment is graded for completion only   - **Make sure you have access to the textbook** - Details are posted on the course website ## Let's visit the website: Homepage ```{=html}
``` ## Course information on the website - **Syllabus** - What this course is about - How grading and homework work - Exams, attendance, and course policies - **Instructors** - Contact information - Office hours - How to get help - **Resources** - R and RStudio installation instructions - Course materials and datasets - Additional support resources ## Let's visit the website: Syllabus ```{=html}
